pages.text: You can enchant your weaponry and armory at a regular enchanting table with the following powerful ancient enchantments:

pages.title: Blight
pages.text: Afflicts the target with Wither, Levitation and Weakness effects for at least 5 seconds.$(br)Applicable to bows.

pages.title: Bloodletting
pages.text: Increases the chance for an additional blood essence drop on reaps by at least 5%.$(br)Applicable to swords.

pages.title: Exude
pages.text: Heals the target from Poison and Wither effects, heals and extinguishes them if burning.$(br)Applicable to armor.

pages.title: Hemorrhage
pages.text: Afflicts the target with the Bleeding effect, dealing periodic damage for at least 5 seconds.$(br)Applicable to swords.

pages.title: Nourishment
pages.text: Replenishes the hunger bar by each damage dealt.$(br)Applicable to armor.

pages.title: Soulsteal
pages.text: Increases the chance for an additional soul essence drop on reaps by at least 5%.$(br)Applicable to swords.
